creator: Taptap Send, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Send more, spend less. Send money from the UK and EU to Africa instantly. Check taptapsend.com for the latest rates. Taptap Send offers:

- Transfers to mobile money in Cameroon, Ghana, and Ivory Coast, and to Wari for cash pickup in Guinea, Senegal, and Mali. Other countries coming soon.
- Great rates. Through technology and great partners, we keep our rates better than traditional money transfer services.
- Simple, easy transfers. All you need is your phone, a debit card, and your friend's name and mobile number.
- Instant delivery and convenient pickup. We immediately deposit funds from your debit card into your friend's mobile money wallet. They'll receive a text and can cash out at any nearby agent.
- Safe and secure payments. Payments are powered by Worldpay and protected using industry standard 128-bit encryption.
- A hassle free experience. If you have any issue with your transfer, we're here for you whenever you need us.

At Taptap Send, we're passionate about making sure that no one is forced to pay unreasonable fees. Join us and get the best rate today.

- Transfers to mobile money in Cameroon, Ghana, Ivory Coast, Madagascar, Kenya, Zambia, and Bangladesh, to banks in Kenya, and to Wari for cash pickup in Guinea, Senegal, and Mali. Other countries coming soon.
- Great rates. Through technology and great partners, we keep our rates better than traditional money transfer services.
- Simple, easy transfers. All you need is your phone, a debit card, and your friend's name and mobile number.
- Instant delivery and convenient pickup. We immediately deposit funds from your debit card into your friend's mobile money wallet. They'll receive a text and can cash out at any nearby agent.
- Safe and secure payments. Payments are protected using bank-level encryption.
- A hassle free experience. If you have any issue with your transfer, we're here for you whenever you need us.

At Taptap Send, we're passionate about making sure that no one is forced to pay unreasonable fees. Join us and get the best rate today.

descriptionShort: Get the best rate on sending money to Africa and Asia.
title: Taptap Send: Money Transfer

creator: Taptap Send, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
No fee (outside of the CFA region), great rate, instant money transfers from the convenience of your phone --- it’s as simple as tap, tap, send; fast, and convenient for you and your family back home. Our team is from the countries to which we send, and we’re focused on best serving you and the community to send, convert and receive money internationally. ‘

NO FEE TRANSFERS
-----------------------------
No fee for transfers outside of fixed exchange rate corridors (e.g., XOF, XAF)
Great exchange rates to save you money
Every day, honest low price --- constant great rates rather than temporary “sales” or “promos”
No hidden fees

SIMPLE
----------------------------
“Absolute delight of a transfer service and app. Simple, great rates and no transfer fees” --- Earl on April 3, 2021
Complete your first transfer in less than 30 seconds

INSTANT
-------------------
90% of transfers complete within 5 minutes
Real-time alerts let you know the current speed before sending

HONEST
--------------------
We’re always going to be honest with you: if there are delays or issues, we tell you

SECURE
-------------------
Taptap Send is licensed in the UK, United States, Canada and the EU for sending money
PCI compliant -- we do not store your credit or debit card information
All of your data is protected with the same 128-bit encryption that banks use
We do NOT sell any of your personal information to ANY third parties

CONVENIENT -- MOBILE MONEY, CASH PICKUP AND BANKS
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Send funds from your card to your recipient’s wallet directly. They'll receive a text and can cash-out at a nearby agent
Mobile-money: send to MTN, M-Pesa, Vodafone, Airtel and Orange (country dependent)
Bank transfers available in Ghana, Kenya and Bangladesh to GCB, Access, Ecobank, Cooperative, Barclays / Absa, Sonali and Islami banks among others
Cash pick-up transfers to CashPlus, Wizall, and Viettel

LOCAL
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Our team is from the communities we serve and speaks over 30 languages
We don’t take a one size fits 150 countries approach, and tailor our solution to local context and needs
We actively support associations and charities in the countries we serve

OUR SUPPORT
----------------------------------------------------------------------
We’re always here to help. If you ever need us or have questions, please email us at support@taptapsend.com.

OUR MISSION
----------------------------------------------------------------------
We started Taptap Send because we believe diaspora communities deserve to have someone fighting for them on their most important financial needs: first and foremost, the need to send money to friends and family. Too often, other companies have overlooked, over-charged and not treated these communities with the respect they deserve. We aim to change that, obsessively pursuing solutions to lower costs, reduce delays, and increase convenience.



Send from: GBP (British Pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US Dollar), CAD (Canadian Dollar)
Send to: BDT (Bangladeshi Taka), GHS (Ghanaian Cedi), GNF (Guinean Franc), KES (Kenyan Shilling), MAD (Moroccan Dirham), MGA (Malagasy Ariary), USD (US Dollar), VND (Vietnamese Dong), XAF (Central African Franc), XOF (West African Franc), ZMW (Zambian Kwacha)

We are not affiliated with Western Union, MoneyGram, WorldRemit, Remitly, Transferwise, Azimo, Small World or Ria.

title: Taptap Send: Send money abroad

creator: Taptap Send, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Transfer money abroad quickly, with great exchange rates and little or no fee (CFA region excepted). Discover Taptap Send and easily send money to your family back home, in Africa and Asia! It’s as simple as tap, tap, send - fast and convenient. Whether you want to send cash to Africa or Asia, we convert and transfer money to many countries, from Ghana to Kenya or even Sri Lanka and Bangladesh. Our team is from the countries we serve, and we’re focused on helping you and the community transfer money and deliver a fast remittance abroad.

5 reasons to download Taptap Send to send cash abroad:
• No fees: send money abroad to Africa and Asia without paying a transfer fee, apart from fixed exchange rate corridors (e.g. XOF, XAF)
• Send money with a great exchange rate: we negotiate the rate daily, so your remittance will reach family without losing much on the way
• No surprises or hidden fees: And should there be a problem with your money transfer, we’ll let you know immediately.
• Fast remittance: Send money within 5 minutes - 90% of the time. Your family will receive your remittance almost immediately, regardless of living in Ghana, Kenya, Bangladesh or elsewhere!
• Mobile Money & cash pick-up: once the money transfer completes, the recipient can cash out at a nearby agent.

SEND MONEY WITHOUT FEE TRANSFERS
• No fee for transfers outside of fixed exchange rate corridors (e.g., XOF, XAF)
• Every day, honest low price - great rates to save you money every day, rather than temporary “sales”

FAST AND SIMPLE REMITTANCE
• 90% of transfers complete within 5 minutes
• Real-time alerts let you know the current speed of transfer before you send cash

SECURE
• Taptap Send is licensed in the UK, the US, Canada and the EU for sending money
• PCI compliant -- when you send money, we don’t store your credit or debit card information
• All your data is protected with the same 128-bit encryption banks use

CONVENIENT -- MOBILE MONEY, CASH PICKUP AND BANKS
• Send cash from your card to your recipient’s wallet. They'll receive a text and can cash out at a nearby agent
• Mobile-money: send to MTN, M-Pesa, Vodafone, Airtel, and Orange, JazzCash, Easypaisa, Amole, and HelloCash (country dependent)
• Bank transfers available in Ghana, Kenya, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, and Vietnam to GCB, Access, Ecobank, Cooperative, Barclays / Absa, Sonali and Islami banks, among others
• Cash pick-up transfers to CashPlus, Wizall, City Express, Wing, Whish and Swared

LOCAL
• Our team is from the communities we serve and speaks over 30 languages
• We don’t take a one-size-fits-150-countries approach to remittance. We tailor solutions to local context and needs. We know what works in Ghana may not work in Kenya or Bangladesh

OUR SUPPORT
We’re here to help. If you ever need us or have questions, please email us at support@taptapsend.com.

OUR MISSION
We started Taptap Send because we believe diaspora communities deserve to have someone fighting for them on important financial needs: first and foremost, the need to send money to friends and family. Too often, other companies have overlooked, over-charged and not treated these communities with respect. We aim to change that, obsessively pursuing remittance solutions that lower costs, reduce delays, and increase convenience.

5 reasons to download Taptap Send to send cash abroad:
• No fees: send money abroad to Africa and Asia without paying a transfer fee, apart from fixed exchange rate corridors (e.g. XOF, XAF)

• No surprises or hidden fees: And should there be a problem with your money transfer, we’ll let you know immediately.
• Fast remittance: Send money within 5 minutes - 90% of the time. Your family will receive your remittance almost immediately, regardless of living in Ghana, Kenya, Bangladesh or elsewhere!
• Mobile Money & cash pick-up: once the money transfer completes, the recipient can cash out at a nearby agent.

SEND MONEY WITHOUT FEE TRANSFERS
• No fee for transfers outside of fixed exchange rate corridors (e.g., XOF, XAF)
• Every day, honest low price - great rates to save you money every day, rather than temporary “sales”

FAST AND SIMPLE REMITTANCE
• 90% of transfers complete within 5 minutes

SECURE
• Taptap Send is licensed in the UK, the US, Canada and the EU for sending money
• PCI compliant -- when you send money, we don’t store your credit or debit card information
• All your data is protected with the same 128-bit encryption banks use

CONVENIENT -- MOBILE MONEY, CASH PICKUP AND BANKS
• Send cash from your card to your recipient’s wallet. They'll receive a text and can cash out at a nearby agent

LOCAL

• Great exchange rates: we negotiate rates every day to try and deliver great ones for you!
• No surprises: no hidden fees here. And if there’s a problem with your transfer, we’ll let you know as soon as possible.

We’re focused on giving you the best experience to send money internationally. And because our team is from the countries to which we send, we know how to make things as smooth and easy as possible for you.

We aim to change that, obsessively pursuing solutions to lower costs, reduce delays, and increase convenience.

title:
Taptap Send: Send money abroad
2.26.0

creator: Taptap Send, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Send money home fast, securely, and with great exchange rates – all from your phone.

With Taptap Send, you can transfer money quickly and affordably to friends and family across Africa, Asia, Latin America, and more. No lines, no paperwork – just tap, tap, send.

Transfer money in minutes with low fees and excellent rates. Whether you're sending money for school, groceries, bills, or emergencies, TapTap Send makes international remittances simple and secure.

Why send money with TapTap Send?

• Fast money transfers – most arrive in minutes

• Low-cost transfers – no hidden fees

• Great exchange rates – more money makes it home

• Secure and licensed – trusted in the UK, US, EU, UAE, Canada, and Australia

• Easy to use – send money from your phone anytime

• Multiple payout options – mobile wallets, bank transfers, and cash pickup

Send money from:

• United Kingdom

• United States

• European Union

• Canada

• United Arab Emirates

• Australia

Transfer money to 50+ countries including:

• Pakistan

• India

• Nigeria

• Ghana

• Brazil

• Mexico

…and many more. Full list at taptapsend.com

Delivery options:

• Mobile wallets – Orange Money, MTN, JazzCash, Easypaisa, bKash

• Bank accounts – HBL, UBL, Access Bank, Fidelity Bank, and others

• Cash pickup – available at select partner banks

Safe and secure money transfers

• PCI-compliant and encrypted

• Your card data is never stored

• We do not sell your personal information

• Regulated in multiple countries

Built by the diaspora, for the diaspora
Our team comes from the communities we serve and speaks over 30 languages. We know what matters when you send money home — reliability, affordability, and care.

Need help? Our support team is just an email away at support@taptapsend.com.

Download TapTap Send today and start sending money with confidence.
Fast. Safe. Affordable.
descriptionShort: Money transfer made easy. Send to Asia, Africa & LatAm with low fee, great rates
